description:
It is a solo single player / FPS game set in World War II, favored by military enthusiasts. Be a hero in a battlefield full of gunfire and blood!

·An interesting mission based on historical facts will take place.
・Each stage, you have a mission based on the story. You can enjoy a suspenseful play.
·You can collect and use various weapons used in World War II.
·With 3D sound and 3D physics engines, you can enjoy realistic and exciting play.
·This game offers a variety of 3D effects and graphics where you can feel the world war.
·You can fight in cooperation with the AI allies in the battlefield.
·You can hide / cover your body to surrounding objects during a battle and fight like a real gun battle.
·[EPISODE] mode aims to clear the mission according to the story.
·In [WAVE] mode, you survive with the goal of clearing 25WAVE.  
·Please enjoy a exciting FPS game using various weapons of allies and enemies you acquire during battle.

A touching ending awaits you 
when you get rid of your enemies and clear all the episodes and 25 waves 
in the historic scenes of World War II.

Prologue
After World War I, Germany had a difficult time accepting defeat.
The Treaty of Versailles did not appease Germany and made it impossible to become a dominant state again.
Harsh reparations have caused hyperinflation due to excessive currency issuance.
The leaders used nationalism and radical nationalism prevailed.
When Nazi Germany invaded Poland in 1939, World War II broke out…
name: World War: Prologue
